tasks.title: [GoGlean] Investigate Shopping Catch All AOV drop (£32 → £21, -35%)
tasks.notes:
Root cause analysis found:
- Campaign: Shopping Catch All (ID: 22439893575)
- Same conversions (13) but revenue dropped £144 (-35%)
- AOV crashed from £32.11 → £21.02
- This is primary driver of ROAS drop (252% → 219%)
- Action: Query product-level data to identify which low-value products are selling
- Expected: Restore high-value product sales mix
